Articles.Content:
Hi guys, if you've ever been on the RB thread you probably know me, so if you do you have no reason to be here! go back to playing KSP!

I am a Life Scout with Troop 416, My eagle project was May 2nd, very close to the release of 1.0 i believe;

I currently own a company called Halco Industries, link is my sig picture.

I play with a couple mods, not too many:

BDArmory

QuizTech Aero

Kerbal Aircraft Expansion (KAX)

HyperEdit (Not for cheating, for testing)

Mechjeb

Kerbal Attachment System (KAS) *I don't play with this one much as it confuses me a bit*

Hopefully this will tell you a bit about me, If not, back off stalker! (JK, but seriously I don't feel comfortable giving out more info than this so please don't ask for more! )

Happy KSPing

~Wafle

Hey, congratulations on your impending Eagle Scout!

I'm with 665, in COLBSA.

There are a bunch of other scouts around the forums, I'll bring them over!

Sorry, have to ask for one last info-bite: Did you get Space Exploration?
Hey waffle, I am an eagle scout but I am an adult now (almost 19), also good luck on your endeavors for eagle. I hope you had fun and will continue to have fun in the scouting program.
Hey man congrats on ur eagle! I am about to get Life, in a year or two I should be Eagle as well

I'm pending eagle as well. (Need a troop to join lol)

I only have till next april. better get moving I guess!

A wild Forum moderator appears!

I am an Eagle, finished it the day before my 18th birthday. Now about to turn 26 and get married, I highly recommend it to anyone.

Welcome to the forums!

I posted a thread in space lounge for Boy scouts and eagle scouts. It is a compilation thread, where I will list every forum user who is/was a boy scout, and the ones who achieved the honor of Eagle Scout. Check it out, and post so you can be on the list! http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/122299-Boy-Scouts-of-America-Compilation?p=1957263#post1957263

Well hello and happy (late) introduction! I've seen you around and you've probably seen my name floating around too . I too am an eagle scout, and boy is it awesome to know a number of them here on the forums. See you around!

I'm pending eagle as well. (Need a troop to join lol)

I only have till next april. better get moving I guess!

Depending on what city you live in (and if you're in texas & america lol) I have a troop to recommend, Troop 416, great troop, i love it there, campouts are fun and always an "adventure"

Did you really just ask me if I lived in America?

hint: BSA= Boy Scouts of America XD

Well, you could be in either of the Overseas Councils

They have really cool patches.
